participant_abstract.sent: Marketing told gave us design ideas: user-friendly, not too many buttons, attractive, speech recognition.
User Interface Design gave overall design ideas and Industrial Design gave a diagram of internal workings and parts.
Target market was determined to be 19-35-year-olds.
Design was discussed with a goal of reducing buttons and giving a fashionable look -- an iPod-like design was proposed.

participant_actions.sent: UID - something with look-and-feel of the product?

participant_decisions.sent: User interface will be buttons (not speech recognition).
DVD functions may be necessary, but not VCR.
IPod-style wheel for changing channels and volume.

participant_problems.sent: Lapel clip mikes still falling off.
We don't know whether to include DVD functions on the remote.
